Plot: Urban legend-style killings begin to occur on a movie set, in this non-sequel sequel to "Urban Legend".
Title: Urban Legends: Final Cut
Writer: Silvio Horta (characters), Paul Harris Boardman, Scott Derrickson
Actors: Jennifer Morrison, Matthew Davis, Hart Bochner, Loretta Devine
tomatoConsensus: This teen horror movie brings nothing new to an already exhausted genre. And it's bad. Really bad.
